item.title: wordlists
item.description: wordlists rockyou2021 This combines all the following passwords lists: crackstation.net/crackstation-wordlist-password-cracking-dictionary.htm hack3r.com/forum-topic/wikipedia-wordlist danielmiessler/SecLists@master/Passwords berzerk0/Probable-Wordlists weakpass.com/download password from 3.2 Billion COMB list from early this year. thanks to whoever created it. Also see Wordlist preformance
